Skeligan, well that depends, right now it uses kas to attach and it doesnt move with the kerbal so i have to make the helmet really tight. Kerbal model related stuff are locked files. But hopefully it get more mod support Im certain the community would bring amazing things in . We cant remove a thing like the kerbals helmet, or his clothes etc. For now...

If we could find out what shader the helmet uses we could make it invisible and then having different helmet as parts, but that would just be visual. The helmet would still be there.

Those helmets are overriding the deafult helmet mesh wise. With other words, im attaching the helmet part to the kerbal and position it over his helmet.

I know vanguard did some nifty things with his eva parachutes, maybe that would be a better way to go then using kas hm. ( Dont get me wrong, Kas gives the game more depth and you can bring new things live trough it so cheers kas team )

But when i or someone else find a way around this then yes we can add new spacesuits with ways of protecting the kerbals =)

I just started working on it so rls is far away i think, or i clean them up and add them as they are and doing some reasearch about plugins. As for now they have visirs that goes up , down and oxygen . I will look into vanguards soruce tomorrow and hopefully learn a thing or two
